column9: The method of cell representation is used wherein in the cell total at first a = sign is added and then rate cell is selected then * sign and then qty cell.
After this press Enter and drag from right lower corner of cell downwards for all the values to get calculated.

column11: Same method is used as above just that the gst remains same for calculation so the feature of constant cell is used.
